paper_abstract: This paper investigates semi-online scheduling problem with known total size on two uniform machines for maximizing the minimum machine completion time. Lower bounds and optimal algorithms for every s >= 1 are given, where s is the speed ratio of two machines. Both the overall competitive ratio and the competitive ratio for s>1+root 5/2 are strictly smaller than those of the optimal algorithms of the corresponding semi-online scheduling problem with known optimal value. It indicates that two related semi-online problems are different.
paper_title: Semi-online machine covering on two uniform machines with known total size
